description: Describes Mux Flow additional and extensible attributes defined in the NMOS Parameter Registers.
title: Mux Flow resource

urn:x-matrox:video_layers.description: Number of video layers in this fully-described mux

urn:x-matrox:audio_layers.description: Number of audio layers in this fully-described mux

urn:x-matrox:data_layers.description: Number of data layers in this fully-described mux

urn:x-matrox:layer_compatibility_groups.description: Indicates the compatibility groups to which this Flow belongs.
